title: Ralph Breaks the Internet
writer: Phil Johnston, Pamela Ribon, Rich Moore
actors: John C. Reilly, Sarah Silverman, Gal Gadot
plot: On a quest to save the video game 'Sugar Rush' and to find a replacement, Ralph and his best friend Vanellope travel to the World Wide Web through a Wi-Fi router they find at the arcade.
awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. 4 wins & 67 nominations total
